Frontal View: side view, back view, profile, looking away, (from behind:1.3), 45-degree angle, turned away, rear view
Three-Quarter View: flat front view, direct profile, head-on, back view, (perfect symmetry:1.2), looking straight at camera
Profile View: facing camera, frontal view, direct eye contact, symmetrical front view, head-on, (eye contact:1.2), back view
Rear View: facing camera, front view, eye contact, portrait, (visible face:1.3), looking at lens, frontal, face-on
Over-the-Shoulder: solo subject, wide shot, frontal, no foreground, (no foreground shoulder:1.1), centered portrait
Symmetry Shot: off-center, tilted, asymmetrical, (rule of thirds:1.1), chaotic composition, unbalanced framing
Rule of Thirds: perfect symmetry, centered subject, exact alignment, vanishing point symmetry, (centered:1.2)
Ground-Level (Floor): high angle, looking down, bird's eye view, aerial, drone, (from above:1.3), standing height, overhead
Ankle-Level: eye level, high angle, looking down, bird's eye view, (from above:1.2), standing height, overhead
Knee-Level (Hero Shot): looking down, high angle, bird's eye view, (from above:1.3), overhead view, top-down
Hip-Level: extreme high angle, worm's eye view, (top-down:1.2), aerial shot, bird's eye
Eye-Level: bird's eye view, worm's eye view, looking straight up, looking straight down, (extreme vertical angle:1.2)
Shoulder-Level: ground level, worm's eye, (extreme low angle:1.2), top-down, aerial, floor level
High-Angle (Overview): looking up, low angle, ground level, (from below:1.2), worm's eye, heroic perspective, floor view
Bird's Eye View: ground level, looking up, eye-level, horizontal, (from below:1.3), low angle, worm's eye view, horizon line
Drone-Level: close-up, ground level, indoor, studio, (low altitude:1.3), eye-level, portrait, macro
Oblique Aerial: ground level, looking up, horizontal view, eye-level, (low perspective:1.2), close-up, macro
Satellite View: perspective distortion, horizon line, ground level, eye-level, (diagonal view:1.2), close-up, 3D perspective
Sub-Level (Crawl Space): high angle, looking down, (open space:1.2), wide horizon, bird's eye view, aerial
Chase Cam: facing camera, front view, eye contact, stationary, (standing still:1.2), indoor, head-on
Leading Shot: back view, rear view, looking away, (trailing behind:1.2), side profile, stationary
Side-Profile Tracking: frontal view, rear view, head-on, (static shot:1.2), no motion blur, centered symmetry
Wheel-Well Cam: high angle, looking down from roof, aerial, (standing height:1.3), eye-level, clean environment
Bumper / Grille Cam: high angle, bird's eye view, looking down, (high altitude:1.2), eye-level, portrait
Hood / Bonnet Mount: rear view, looking away from car, back seat, (standing on ground:1.2), side view car
Dashcam POV: outside car, side view, aerial, (rear view:1.2), walking, standing
Handlebar Cam: static tripod, (perfectly stable:1.2), bird's eye view, third-person perspective, looking at bike
Fender-Mount: frontal view, top-down, (inside car:1.2), eye-level, portrait framing
Low-Level Chase: looking down, high altitude, bird's eye, (standing height:1.3), high angle, horizon in center
Dutch Angle (Tilted): stable horizon, level camera, (straight axis:1.2), symmetrical, centered, vertical, horizontal
Telephoto Compression: wide-angle, (deep background distance:1.2), fisheye, distorted depth, peripheral stretching, vast space
Fish-eye Distortion: rectilinear, (straight lines:1.3), telephoto, narrow view, flat horizon, undistorted, normal lens
Wide-Angle Lens (14mm): telephoto, (compressed depth:1.2), narrow field of view, zoomed in, close-up, background blur
Dolly Zoom (Vertigo Effect): natural perspective, static background, consistent depth, (normal lens:1.1)
Split-Diopter Shot: blurred background, blurred foreground, (natural depth of field:1.2), shallow focus, bokeh
Snorricam (Body-Mount): third-person perspective, steady cam, (static subject:1.1), moving subject in frame, wide shot
Deep Focus: (blurred background:1.3), (blurred foreground:1.2), bokeh, shallow depth of field, soft focus, out of focus
Soft Focus / Dreamy: sharp edges, high contrast, (extreme sharpness:1.2), deep focus, realistic textures, grainy
Anamorphic Widescreen: round bokeh, vertical flares, (square aspect ratio:1.2), 4:3, portrait orientation
Bed-Level (Supine): high angle, looking down, standing height, bird's eye view, (from above:1.2), outdoor, far shot
Top-Down Bed: looking up, low angle, ground level, (from below:1.3), horizontal view, side view
Floor-Level Reclined: high angle, (looking down:1.2), bird's eye view, standing height, overhead, eye-level
Boudoir Close-Up: sharp focus everywhere, (deep focus:1.2), wide shot, distant subject, harsh lighting, landscape
Pillow-Talk POV: aerial view, (wide shot:1.3), full body, third-person perspective, standing, distant, zoomed out
Curvature Highlight: frontal lighting, (flat lighting:1.2), bright environment, high-key, no shadows, overexposed
Vanity Mirror View: direct shot, no reflection, (no mirror:1.2), back view, outdoor
CCTV High-Corner: eye-level, low angle, ground level, cinematic lighting, (clean image:1.2), professional photography, looking up
Bodycam POV: stable camera, (stationary:1.2), zoom, telephoto, high quality, static, third-person perspective
Through-the-Gap: open view, (unobstructed:1.3), clear shot, wide open, professional studio, centered
Binocular View: (no mask:1.3), full frame, wide angle, clear edges, no vignetting, (unmasked:1.2)
Peephole Perspective: rectilinear, (straight lines:1.3), undistorted, wide view, no vignette, no border
Long-Lens Surveillance: close-up, clear view, (no obstacles:1.2), studio, intentional posing, clean focus
Hidden Nanny-Cam: high-end cinematography, (professional setup:1.2), eye-level, moving camera, posed portrait
One-Point Perspective: asymmetrical, (off-center:1.2), tilted, dutch angle, chaotic, diagonal lines
Corner-to-Corner: flat view, centered, telephoto, (compressed space:1.2), macro, close-up
Floor-to-Ceiling Vertical: looking down, bird's eye view, (high angle:1.3), horizontal horizon, flat view
Horizon-Split: asymmetrical horizon, (tilted:1.2), high horizon, low horizon, close-up, portrait orientation
Vista-Wide: close-up, (zoomed in:1.3), macro, indoor, cramped space, telephoto, portrait
Framed-by-Nature: open field, no borders, (unobstructed view:1.2), clear sky, studio
Through-the-Glass: clear view, no glass, (no obstruction:1.3), clean lens, sharp background, outdoor, high contrast
Weapon-Sight POV: third-person perspective, wide shot, (no crosshairs:1.2), no overlay, looking away from target
Insect-Perspective: bird's eye view, looking down, (standing height:1.3), human scale, aerial, wide shot, landscape
Keyhole-View: (full frame:1.3), no border, no vignette, wide open view, (unobstructed:1.2), clear shot
Inside-the-Box: open space, outdoor, (wide horizon:1.2), high angle, no borders, far shot
Mirror-Fragment: perfect reflection, (unbroken mirror:1.3), clear glass, single image, symmetrical, stable composition
X-Ray / Thermal Vision: natural skin tones, realistic colors, (no overlay:1.2), daylight, normal vision, 8k raw photo
